link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 改进 二级设置页面的标题更新 [1.10.0-dev3]
  2. 修复 打开播放列表详情等界面时崩溃 [1.10.0-dev3]
  3. 修复 播放列表详情中将项目移至底部时崩溃 [1.10.0-dev2]
  4. 修复 播放列表详情中对项目重新排序项目行为异常 [1.10.0-dev2]
  5. 修复 播放列表详情中多选菜单无响应的问题
releaseNote.en:
1. Improve: update titles for secondary pages in Settings [1.10.0-dev3]
  2. Fix: crash when opening Playlist Detail and more [1.10.0-dev3]
  3. Fix: crash when move an item to bottom in Playlist Detail [1.10.0-dev2]
  4. Fix: issues of reordering items in Playlist Detail [1.10.0-dev2]
  5. Fix: no response of Playlist Detail multi-selection menu

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 内部数据库更新问题 [1.10.0-dev2]
  2. 修复 切换随机播放模式时偶尔会随机更改封面
  3. 修复 通知上的快进和快退失效
  4. 修复 主播放器中主色调变化动画
  5. 改进 重新组织分类设置项目，并使用二级页面
  6. 改进 添加“起始目录”设置的入口，展开路径过滤器设置
  7. 改进 重新设计主播放器，支持更灵活样式选择和支持自定义按钮
  8. 改进 主播放器播放队列顶部附近添加随机模式和循环模式按钮
  9. 修改 将播放队列相关菜单项移播放队列顶部菜单
  10. 修改 禁止从 v1.7.0 之前的版本升级，警告从 v1.8.4 之前的版本升级
  11. 翻译 更新 匈牙利语 (Balázs Úr & Balázs Meskó)
  12. 开发 更新依赖, 更新 Kotlin 至 2.1.20, 更新 AGP 至 8.9.2
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: issues of internal database updating [1.10.0-dev2]
  2. Fix: random changing artwork occasionally when toggling shuffle mode
  3. Fix: forward and rewind from notification
  4. Fix: broken color animation in Main Player
  5. Improve: reorganize items in Settings, support secondary pages
  6. Improve: add entrance of Start Directory settings, flatten path filter settings
  7. Improve: slightly redesign Main Player, with more flexible styles and more customizable buttons
  8. Improve: add shuffle mode and repeat mode buttons near to Playing Queue header in Main Player
  9. Modify: move relative menu items to Playing Queue menu in Main Player
  10. Modify: forbid upgrading from prior to v1.7.0 & warn upgrading from prior to v1.8.4
  11. Translation: update Hungarian (by Balázs Úr & Balázs Meskó)
  12. Development: update dependencies, upgrade Kotlin to 2.1.20, upgrade AGP to 8.9.2
